objects.text:
Luxury Woody Aromatic Scent
Premium Sandalwood & Leather Notes
Long-Lasting Elegant Composition
Unisex Eau de Parfum 100ml

product_details.description: Launched by the design house of Le Labo in the year 2011. This woody aromatic fragrance has a blend of sandalwood, leather, papyrus, cedar, cardamom, violet, iris, and amber notes. It is long lasting fragrance. Launched by the design house of Le Labo in the year 2011 This woody aromatic fragrance has a blend of sandalwood, leather, papyrus, cedar, cardamom, violet, iris, and amber notes It is long lasting fragrance Brand - Le Labo ** Item Form - EDP Spray ** Item Volume - 50 Milliliters ** Scent - Sandalwood ** Special Feature - Long lasting **

banner_details:
This banner features a minimalist and elegant layout showcasing a premium fragrance product. The background comprises layered soft beige-tone rectangles with curved accents and subtle design strokes, creating a refined aesthetic suitable for a luxury brand. The top text layer (`heading`) presents the product name in a sleek, modern font, followed by a bold subheading (`subheading`) emphasizing the brand identity. Supporting text (`description`) provides concise fragrance notes and product details. A bold call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) appears beneath the text, contrasting the backdrop. The right side displays the product image (`product_image`) of a perfume bottle and box for visual emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Creamy Off-white (#FAF7F2, #F2EDE4)
- Rich Charcoal (#3E3A36)
- Earthy Taupe (#6D634F)
- Soft Warm Gray (#5A5145)
- Accents: Pale Beige (#E6E0D5), Sand Brown (#C3BAA9)
product_color: The product image of Le Labo's Santal 33 showcases a minimalist, earthy aesthetic that emphasizes simplicity and craftsmanship. The main color palette includes a warm kraft brown (#C4A484) from the box, matte black (#2A2A2A) text, soft off-white (#F3F3F0) on the label, and subtle silver-gray (#B4B4B4) from the bottle cap. These colors blend harmoniously, reflecting an artisanal and luxurious feel. The muted tones highlight the natural, apothecary-style branding of Le Labo. To create an advertisement banner, use this refined palette to maintain brand consistency and evoke a sense of bespoke sophistication while ensuring bold contrast for readability and elegance.
